com.hardwarestore.controller

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hardwarestore.controller.AdminController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin")
public class AdminController
extends Object
    This class represents controller responsible for all activities that occur on the admin page.
    Author:
    Radovan Tadic

        @RequestMapping(value="/updateproduct",
                method=POST)
public String updateProductPost(@RequestParam

                                                                                                       @RequestParam
                                                                                                       String name,

                                                                                                       String price,

                                                                                                       IOException
